field.name: summary
field.value: The DefaultDependencyResolver does not properly CanResolveServiceDependency when using service overrides

field.name: description
field.value:
I registered a transient component that had a service override configuration for the constructor. I was able to resolve the component from the kernel the first time, however when I tried a seconds time, the component activator failed while resolving the parameter model dependency.
Cause: Service Overrides in parameters are initially represented as a service dependency. Then the DefaultDependencyResolver resolves the dependency the first time, it converts it into a real Service Override dependency. However, when a following attempt is made to determine if the dependency can be resolved, the CanResolveServiceDependency did not check for a Service Override dependency.
